Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Malibu in 1976...
Injured on 8/31/1978 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1979, off Gabriel Vargas (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1979, off James Riley (NE)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1979, hitting .254 with 19 HR, 82 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 5/3/1980...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Bay City on 8/30/1980...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Columbus on 9/29/1980...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 4/14/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1981, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Toledo on 5/14/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1983, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1984, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Plum Grove on 8/17/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1985, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
